005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.DocumentFunctionException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
024import java.net.URLConnection;
025import java.util.List;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029public final class FnDocumentAvailable {
030  private static final String NAME = "doc-available";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextDependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("arg1")
040          .type(IStringItem.class)
041          .zeroOrOne()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
044      .returnOne()
045      .functionHandler(FnDocumentAvailable::execute)
046      .build();
047
048  private FnDocumentAvailable() {
049    // disable construction
050  }
051
052  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
053  @NonNull
054  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
055      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
056      IItem focus) {
057    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
058
059    IStringItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
060
061    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(fnDocAvailable(item, dynamicContext));
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Test if the document associated with the URI is retrievable.
066   * <p>
067   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
068   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc-available">fn:doc</a>
069   * function.
070   *
071   * @param documentUri
072   *          the resource to load the data from
073   * @param context
074   *          the Metapath dynamic context
075   * @return if the document is retrievable
076   */
077  public static IBooleanItem fnDocAvailable(@NonNull IStringItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
078    IAnyUriItem uri;
079    try {
080      uri = IAnyUriItem.cast(documentUri);
081    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
082      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT,
083          String.format("Invalid URI argument '%s' to fn:doc or fn:doc-available.", documentUri.asString()), ex);
084    }
085
086    return fnDocAvailable(uri, context);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Test if the document associated with the URI is retrievable.
091   * <p>
092   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
093   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc-available">fn:doc</a>
094   * function.
095   *
096   * @param documentUri
097   *          the resource to load the data from
098   * @param context
099   *          the Metapath dynamic context
100   * @return if the document is retrievable
101   */
102  public static IBooleanItem fnDocAvailable(@NonNull IAnyUriItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
103    // resolve if possible
104    IAnyUriItem uri = FnResolveUri.fnResolveUri(documentUri, null, context);
105    if (!uri.isAbsolute() && !uri.isOpaque()) {
106      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
107          .format("No base-uri is available in the static context to resolve the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()));
108    }
109
110    boolean retval;
111    try {
112      URLConnection connection = uri.asUri().toURL().openConnection();
113
114      if (connection instanceof HttpURLConnection) {
115        HttpURLConnection httpConnection = (HttpURLConnection) connection;
116        httpConnection.setRequestMethod("HEAD");
117        httpConnection.connect();
118        retval = HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK == httpConnection.getResponseCode();
119        httpConnection.disconnect();
120      } else {
121        connection.connect();
122        retval = true;
123      }
124      return IBooleanItem.valueOf(retval);
125    } catch (IOException ex) {
126      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
127          .format("Unable to retrieve the resource identified by the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()), ex);
128    }
129  }
130}
